name: Ogre & Friends Racing
description:
I didn't do the optional theme.

Click on the screen first to activate keyboard events. If you see a blank screen refresh the page (not sure why that happened on 1st load).

Controls:

Number Keys to select from the menus

Left, Right, Up, Down to control the car

Spacebar when the pumpkin appears to shoot it at a player ahead of you and permanently make them stuck.

M at the end of the race to go back to the Main Menu.

Source Code:

AGPL v3 License. git clone  https://koreyhinton.org/git/ogreracing.git

Game Info:
Based on the popular Shrek Kart game for iOS that was taken off the app store. Created as a simplified version for NES.
